thread.title: James Kelley

author: James Kelley
title: James Kelley
text: We arrived in Cairo a day early for our cruise. I emailed Rasha and she promptly provided a custom itinerary. We were quite impressed with Rasha and the tour. She is both knowledgeable and personable. We visited a mosque, a museum, two Coptic churches and a synagogue. After a late lunch near the market we walked through the old city. A lot to see in a day but the pace was good, We highly recommend a tour with Rasha.
